node.name: Transfer to O.R.
node.description: Recipient is summoned for transplantation by anaesthetist.

node.name: Anaesthesia and operating patient
node.description: Operating room co-workers conduct actions according to working instructions before the operation.

node.name: Guarding patient on recovery and transfer to nursing ward
node.description: Recovery room personnel observes and treats, under the responsibility of the anaesthetist, the recipient according to protocol... The recipient is permitted transfer from recovery room to the nursing ward if the recipient meets criteria for transfer...
